titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized for his athletic achievements and commitment to young people.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized for his athletic achievements and commitment to young people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized as one of history's greatest professional boxers.
